00218 inline void 
00219 MapModuleNotice::setGfxData( const GfxData* gfx )
00220 {
00221    delete m_gfxData;
00222    //m_gfxData = new GfxDataFull( *dynamic_cast<const GfxDataFull*>(gfx) );
00223    m_gfxData = GfxData::createNewGfxData(NULL, gfx);
00224    // Also update the bounding box.
00225    m_gfxData->getMC2BoundingBox( m_bbox );
00226 }
